title: 每次死亡就崩客户端
author: dualipa
txt_content:
在服务器内崩溃... 单单是客户端







crash-2020-05-20_19.15.41-client.txt


2020-5-20 19:24 上传
点击文件名下载附件




37.23 KB, 下载次数: 5

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
[家具]furniture-6.3.1-1.12.2.jar的锅

Block type: ID #1584 (tile.mirror // com.mrcrayfish.furniture.blocks.BlockMirror // cfm:mirror)
Block location: World: (-701,71,1457)
Chunk: (at 3,4,1 in -44,91; contains blocks -704,0,1456 to -689,255,1471)
Region: (-2,2; contains chunks -64,64 to -33,95, blocks -1024,0,1024 to -513,255,1535)


尝试拆除-701,71,1457这个坐标的方块
镜子导致的

replies.author: dualipa
replies.txt_content:
结城希亚 发表于 2020-5-20 19:25
[家具]furniture-6.3.1-1.12.2.jar的锅
有办法解决吗

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
在客户端的forge.cfg内设置
removeErrorTileEntities=true
removeErrrorEntities=true
仍不行请删除mrcrayfish
